name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch testing-dojo-codelab.md --exec "claat export -o temp/ testing-dojo-codelab.md && ./node_modules/kill-port/cli.js --port 9090 && cd temp/testing-dojo-codelab && claat serve"
